This work was supported by grant # 07/ 59319-5 Sao Paulo Research Foundation -Fapesp -http://www.fapesp.br/en/ -NBM; grant # 015/ 2014-Fundo de Apoio à Dermatologia do Estado de São Paulo "Sebastião Sampaio" -Funadersp -http://www.sbd-sp.org.br/funadersp.php -PENFV; grant # 043/2016 -Fundo de Apoio à Dermatologia do Estado de São Paulo "Sebastião Sampaio" -Conclusion EFA treatment induces topical (observed by local IGF-1, leptin, IL-6 and IFN-γ production) and systemic effects, lowering IL-6 levels in the serum. As the oil is widely used to shorten ulcer healing time, studies are needed to evaluate the treatment safety and possible unde-sired effects.
